jacamo.infra

Class JaCaMoAgArch

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.architecture.AgArch
      • jacamo.infra.JaCaMoAgArch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jason.architecture.AgArchInfraTier, java.lang.Comparable<jason.architecture.AgArch>

    public class JaCaMoAgArch
extends jason.architecture.AgArch
    This class provides an agent architecture when using JaCaMo infrastructure to run the MAS inside Jason. The communication and agent management comes from Centralised Infra and Perceive and Act are delegated to Cartago.
